outputPath.description: The output path for the build

projectRoot.description: The root directory of the project

fontFile.description: Path to the font declaration file (e.g., 'src/fonts.ts'). If not specified, will look for fonts.ts in common locations.

injectTailwind.description: Automatically inject Tailwind CSS configuration for fonts. Set to 'v3' for Tailwind v3, 'v4' for Tailwind v4, or true to auto-detect (defaults to v4).

tailwindFile.description: Custom path to Tailwind config file (for v3) or styles file (for v4). If not specified, will auto-detect.
